articles.author: Michael D'Antonio
articles.title: McConnell and McCarthy crawl back to Trump's side
articles.description: History will surely mark January 6th as a singular tragedy --a blood-soaked insurrection by pseudo-patriots worshiping in the "cult of Donald Trump." But Republican lawmakers are moving on, writes Michael D'Antonio.

articles.author: Dakin Andone, CNN
articles.title: A huge piece of California's Highway 1 near Big Sur collapsed into the ocean
articles.description: A huge piece of California's Highway 1 was washed out this week by a winter storm that brought heavy rain and snow. Images and drone footage from the scene show a huge gap in the scenic highway, which runs along much of the coast.
articles.content:
(CNN)A huge piece of California's Highway 1 was washed out this week by a winter storm that brought heavy rain and snow.

articles.author: Caroline Kenny, CNN
articles.title: South Carolina GOP censures Rep. Tom Rice after his vote to impeach Trump
articles.description: The South Carolina Republican Party voted Saturday to formally censure Rep. Tom Rice, who represents the state's 7th Congressional District, for his vote to impeach former President Donald Trump in the House of Representatives.

articles.title: A 10-year-old investor made big bucks on the GameStop shares he got for Kwanzaa

articles.title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene boasts of 'great' conversation with Trump amid calls for her ouster
articles.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene announced Saturday she had spoken with former President Donald Trump amid calls for her expulsion from Congress, saying she'll "never apologize" as she faces backlash over recently resurfaced controversial comments.

articles.author: Arnaud Siad and Schams Elwazer, CNN
articles.title: Five men arrested after asylum center set ablaze in UK
articles.description: Five men have been arrested in connection with a fire "believed to have been started deliberately" at a UK asylum facility on Friday.

articles.author: Eoin McSweeney and Arnaud Siad, CNN
articles.title: Austrian man leaves fortune to French village that saved his family from Nazis
articles.description: An Austrian man who died in December has left an undisclosed fortune to the French village of Le Chambon-sur-Lignon to thank residents for hiding his family from Nazis during World War II.

articles.title: See what's streaming in February
articles.description: See some of what's streaming on Netflix, HBO Max, Disney+ and more in February.

articles.author: Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Arizona GOP chair Kelli Ward rejects calls for audit of party elections
articles.description: Kelli Ward on Friday rejected calls for an audit into her recent reelection as the chair of the Arizona Republican Party and other party races, arguing that the state GOP does not have the structure to review them.

articles.title: Biden's Supreme Court commission set to launch as some liberals are eager to pack the court

articles.author: Ben Church, CNN
articles.title: Chelsea left 'disgusted' by online racism directed at Reece James and calls for more action
articles.description: Chelsea has called on social media platforms to do more to tackle racism online after defender Reece James was subject to abuse on Friday.

articles.author: Kelly McCleary, CNN
articles.title: Kraft is cooking up pink mac & cheese for Valentine's Day
articles.description: One of the greatest duos of all time -- macaroni and cheese -- is getting a Valentine's Day makeover.

articles.author: Martin Goillandeau, CNN
articles.title: Sophie, Grammy-nominated artist, dies aged 34
articles.description: Grammy-nominated experimental pop artist and producer Sophie Xeon -- publicly known as Sophie -- died in a "terrible accident" on Saturday morning aged 34, according to a statement from her record label Transgressive.

articles.title: The first sign of alien life? This astrophysicist thinks so
articles.description: A Harvard astrophysicist says our solar system was visited by a piece of extraterrestrial technology or debris from a distant alien civilization.
